features: RAZORS FOR WOMEN : Includes our Flamingo women’s razor handle, 4 5-razor blade refills for women, and a coordinating shower holder that keeps your women’s razor for shaving with reach.
5 RAZOR BLADES: 5 sharp, ultra-thin razor blades made from high-quality stainless steel for a really close, comfortable shave and lasting results.

COMFORTABLE & SMOOTH SHAVE : Our razor blades are surrounded by a water-activated 360° comfort system with aloe and shea butter—this system helps protect skin from irritation and provides an easy glide.

THOUGHTFUL DESIGN : Our razor handles for women are ergonomically designed to fit comfortably in your hand. The razor handle is weighted and finished with a no-slip grip for a secure hold. Also, our flexible hinge is designed to hug every curve and help you reach hard-to-shave areas
SUSTAINABILITY : At least 35% of the plastic in every razor handle is recycled.
2022 ALLURE BEST OF BEAUTY BODY AWARD WINNER
body.description: The Flamingo women’s 5 blade razor is designed for a really close, really comfortable shave. The Flamingo razor features 5 sharp, ultra-thin blades made from high-quality stainless steel for close, lasting results. Razor blades are surrounded by a 360° comfort system with aloe and shea butter including a water-activated lubricating ribbon and strip—this system helps protect skin from irritation and provides an easy glide. Flamingo razor handles are ergonomically designed to fit comfortably in your hand. The razor handle is weighted and finished with a no-slip grip for a secure hold. The Flamingo women’s razor features a flexible hinge designed to hug every curve and help you reach hard-to-shave areas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Smooth and Precise Shave
reviews.reviewText: I recently switched to the Flamingo 5-Blade Razors for Women, and I am thrilled with the results. These razors have truly elevated my shaving experience, and here's why.First and foremost, the design is both ergonomic and aesthetically pleasing. The handle has a comfortable grip, providing excellent control and maneuverability during shaving. The vibrant colors add a fun touch, making the razor not just a functional tool but also a stylish accessory in my bathroom.Now, let's talk about performance. The five blades make a significant difference in the smoothness of the shave. They effortlessly glide over the skin, leaving it incredibly smooth without any nicks or irritation. I've tried other razors with fewer blades, but the Flamingo 5-Blade Razors stand out in terms of precision and closeness.The moisturizing strip is another standout feature. It's enriched with botanical oils, and I can feel the difference it makes during and after shaving. My skin feels hydrated and refreshed, eliminating the need for an additional shaving cream or gel. This is a game-changer for those with sensitive skin like mine.I appreciate the flexibility of the razor head, which easily contours to the curves of my body. Whether I'm shaving my legs, underarms, or bikini area, the Flamingo razor adapts seamlessly, providing a thorough and efficient shave every time.What's also worth mentioning is the longevity of these razors. I've been using the same blade for weeks, and it still maintains its sharpness. This not only saves money in the long run but also reduces waste, making it an environmentally conscious choice.In terms of value for money, Flamingo 5-Blade Razors offer an excellent balance. The quality and performance rival high-end brands, but the price point is much more budget-friendly.In conclusion, if you're looking for a razor that combines style, precision, and hydration, the Flamingo 5-Blade Razors for Women are a fantastic choice. I'm thoroughly satisfied with the results, and I highly recommend them for a smooth and enjoyable shaving experience.

reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this brand for months now and I love the usage and the aesthetic of the brand. Will continue to use 💗💗💗

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get if you want a smooth body🪒
reviews.reviewText: I’m a female that’s been using men razors to shave for the past 5+ years because I thought they were “better”. I recently decided I wanted to switch. When the razor came I wanted to compare my mens razor (brand Harry) to these. I was shocked the difference. This product was so smooth on my sensitive skin. I didn’t even feel any of the razors slide across. So if you want smooth skin and a quick shave, get this product! 🪒

reviews.reviewText: A good clean shave! Only dislike was the box it came in. The 1 end should be taped. Product could easily fall out if came open

reviews.reviewText: First, the packaging is super cute! I was so excited to use the product and when i did, i was *not* disappointed. Very smooth and easy shave. I don't think i will be trying any other brand, anytime soon.

reviews.reviewText: This is hands down the best razor I have ever used in my life! It works so well and is absolutely worth the money. My favorite feature is the show hook that suctions to the wall for safe storage!

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't stay sharp for long.
reviews.reviewText: Razor heads are way too bulky. The plastic scratches up my skin. I went back to my tried and true Billie blades.
Very comfortable to use. Does the job.
Best razor I’ve ever used. My only complaint is that the suction on the hanger doesn’t stay stuck to my shower wall.
Nothing special about it. Doesn’t shave to the very edge. Overhyped.
J’adore ce rasoir. Acheté la 1er fois au Costco. J achète les lames car rase très bien

reviews.reviewTitle: i did not receive 4 refills - i received one
reviews.reviewText: This was advertised as a kit with one razor, one shower holder and 4 refills. I got 1 refill. Not happy.
